items.content_html:
I’m going to take a run at posting a photo for each of 30 straight days, and — as a way of needlessly complicating things for myself — I’m going to structure it as 3 pictures from each year: 2012-21.

I’ll try to add a little context where it’s useful. Let’s see how we get on.
items.content_text:

items.content_html: At the time of writing I feel like my queue of albums to listen to is a bit more under control. It had sprawled out to 30+ records, but we’re now down to a more manageable eight.
items.content_text: At the time of writing I feel like my [queue of albums to listen to](https://zioibi.com/2022music) is a bit more under control. It had sprawled out to 30+ records, but we're now down to a more manageable eight.

items.title: #001 — A New Mantra
items.content_html: Within the first ten words of this debut episode of Flux Observer, I make a mistake: I call something a mantra, when it’s really more of an aphorism. But that’s OK, because this whole thing is an experiment, and it’s allowed to be a mess. What’s more, this episode is specifically about letting go of the idea of perfectibility.
items.content_text:
Within the first ten words of this debut episode of *Flux Observer*, I make a mistake: I call something a mantra, when it's really more of an aphorism. But that's OK, because this whole thing is an experiment, and it’s allowed to be a mess. What's more, this episode is specifically about letting go of the idea of perfectibility.  
  


<audio controls="controls" src="https://infinite.jetzt/uploads/2022/48ad7c2ced.mp3" preload="metadata" />

If you’re not already subscribed, you can read online, and consider signing up. 📝

items.content_html: Hello there — and a happy Obi-Wan Kenobi release day to all who observe. To celebrate, I asked @burk to add a Star Wars tagmoji to his list of community suggestions, and he kindly agreed: ✨
items.content_text: Hello there — and a happy *Obi-Wan Kenobi* release day to all who observe. To celebrate, I asked [@burk](https://micro.blog/burk) to add a Star Wars tagmoji to [his list of community suggestions](https://burk.io/discover/), and he kindly agreed: ✨
